title: GEN_SQR Function Block
description: This function block generates a square wave signal based on the input parameters. It uses duty cycle (DC), amplitude (AM), and offset (OS) to determine the output signal. The block takes time parameters to control the frequency and timing of the generated signal.
name: GEN_SQR

input.name: PT
input.description: The period time for the square wave generation.

input.name: AM
input.description: The amplitude of the output signal. Default is 1.0.

input.name: OS
input.description: The offset value added to the output signal.

input.name: DC
input.description: The duty cycle of the square wave. Default is 0.5.

input.name: DL
input.description: The dead time. This is used to control the timing of the edges in the output signal.

output.name: Q
output.description: A boolean output indicating the current state of the square wave signal.

output.name: Out
output.description: The generated output value of the square wave signal.
